text: Hianagi Kagri vahe'mo'zama fri'nafintira oti'sageno, zamavufagamo'a kasefa hanige'za manigahaze. Hagi fri'za kugupama se'naza vahe'mo'za oti'za muse zagame hugahaze. Na'ankure nanterama osi ata ko neriaza hunka ama mopa ru kasefa nehunka, fri'naza vahera fri'nafintira zamazeri otinka zamasimura zamigahane.
